com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.service

Interface ServiceMessageListener


  • public interface ServiceMessageListener

    This interface allows to define callback functions for messages and connection handling.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnection(java.lang.String remoteAddress)
      Method allowing to notify when a connection is performed with a remote peer.
      void onConnectionClosed(java.lang.String remoteAddress)
      Method allowing to notify when a connection is closed with a remote peer.
      void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method allowing to notify when an exception has occurred during the connection process.
      void onMessageReceived(MessageAdHoc message)
      Method allowing to notify when message is received.
      void onMsgException(java.lang.Exception e)
      Method allowing to notify when an exception has occurred during the message process.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageReceived

        void onMessageReceived(MessageAdHoc message)
        Method allowing to notify when message is received.
        Parameters:
        message - a MessageAdHoc object which represents the message to send through the network.

      • onConnectionClosed

        void onConnectionClosed(java.lang.String remoteAddress)
        Method allowing to notify when a connection is closed with a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - a String value which represents the address of the remote peer.

      • onConnection

        void onConnection(java.lang.String remoteAddress)
        Method allowing to notify when a connection is performed with a remote peer.
        Parameters:
        remoteAddress - a String value which represents the address of the remote peer.

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method allowing to notify when an exception has occurred during the connection process.
        Parameters:
        e - an Exception object which contains the exception which has been caught during the connection process.

      • onMsgException

        void onMsgException(java.lang.Exception e)
        Method allowing to notify when an exception has occurred during the message process.
        Parameters:
        e - an Exception object which contains the exception which has been caught during the message process.
